clinical_study.brief_title: Exploratory Study for Allergy Relief Onset
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-blind, Randomized, Placebo Controlled, Crossover Pilot Study to Evaluate the Onset of Action of an Antihistamine in Subjects Following Allergen Exposure in an Allergen Chamber

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of the study is to explore the onset of effect of an antihistamine in a controlled environment.

primary_outcome.measure: The time to the meaningful relief, as defined by at least 15% of reduction from baseline in Total Symptom Score (TSS)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with adverse events as a measure of safety

arm_group.description: Subjects will be given BAY X002134
Subjects will be given a placebo
